attributes.action: Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to show they support all of their service personnel, that will hold up and support this country in the possible time of need that faces us. Service personnel will work tirelessly through this pandemic and the government need to show some form of recognition for this.
attributes.background: I want the government to show its support by funding a bonus payment to the UK’s service personnel that have to work through the pandemic regardless of the closures that face the country. Support the United Kingdom’s emergency services, like they support the country in times of need.
